Necromancy gets him out of bed in the morning.
The animated classic that never was
Unlock MOAB Skins from Bling Seasons, Hero Rewards and Tower Masteries
Unlock Bloon Decorations from Bling Seasons, Hero Rewards and Tower Masteries
Unlock Pop FX from Bling Seasons, Hero Rewards and Tower Masteries
Unlock Tower and Bloon Boost FX from Bling Seasons, Hero Rewards and Tower Masteries
Hurls a boomerang that follows a curved path. Good range and pierce.
Launches a powerful bomb at the Bloons. Slow rate of fire but affects a radius around the explosion. Has full map range.
Shoots a short-range volley of sharp tacks in 8 directions.
Pops and freezes nearby Bloons for a short time. Frozen Bloons are immune to sharp damage. Can't freeze White, Zebra or Lead Bloons.
Shoots a blob of sticky glue that slows Bloons down by 50%.
Can shoot Bloons it can see anywhere on the screen with a long-range rifle, and pops 2 layers off Bloons hit by it.
Shoots homing torp-e-darts at nearby Bloons. Must be placed in water.
Shoots a single, heavy dart from both sides of the ship. Must be placed in water.
Flies above the ground shooting volleys of high-pierce darts.
Hovers wherever you last tapped the screen. Shoots from twin heavy dart guns.
Hovers wherever you last clicked the screen. Shoots from twin heavy dart guns.
Launches an exploding mortar shell to a fixed location anywhere on the screen.
Hurls magical bolts of energy at the Bloons. Can upgrade to a variety of powerful spells.
Uses a dart-shooting machine-gun. Aims wherever you last tapped on the screen.
Uses a dart-shooting machine-gun. Aims wherever you last clicked on the screen.
Throws hundreds of darts at hypersonic speed with a huge attack range.
Stealthy and fast Monkey that throws bladed shurikens to pop the Bloons. Can target Camo Bloons.
Harnessing powers of science and magic, splashes Bloons with acid, also brews various potions with different effects.
Creates a blast of thorns for each attack. Upgrades can call forth powers of the Jungle, Storm or Wrath.
Generates Bananas each round that convert into game money to spend on more stuff.
Holds a trusty nail-gun to pop the Bloons. Can upgrade to create its own nail-shooting sentry turrets.
Automatically generates piles of Road Spikes on the nearby track. Excellent last line of defense.
Place of Monkey education and training. Grants powerful benefits for Military, Magic and Hero Monkeys. Generates a small amount of Hero XP every round.
Hub of Monkey industry, has a number of different benefits to aid all of your Monkeys. Increases range of all monkeys in its radius by 10%.
"With enough fuel and air, everything burns!"
"I like blue hair... and blue fire!"
"I love the smell of bubblewrap in the morning!"
Proud, strong and intelligent, Quincy uses his bow to perform feats of amazing skill.
Striker Jones is a strong Commander who uses his knowledge of long range combat to greatly boost the power of explosives.
In his armored battle tank, the Captain is a no-nonsense powerhouse on the battlefield.
Gwendolin believes there hasn't yet been a Bloon problem that can't be solved with fire. Lots of fire.
Using his elite hacking skills, Benjamin can generate extra money for the cause.
Pat is a huge Monkey of enormous strength. His unique size and power is a great asset in the war on Bloons.
Ezili is a wielder of dark arts and manipulator of Bloons. Beware.
Commanding powers of nature, Obyn can shoot through solid obstacles with his spirit wolf attack.
When Quincy was injured by a nefarious DDT, many feared the worst. But Dr. Monkey knew that they had the technology, and that they could rebuild him. He is Quincy, evolved from Quincy.
We came from the Oceans, and we shall return to the Oceans.
The Sun God hath no fury like Biker Bones unchained.
Divine Bolt seeks out and destroys.
The Long Arm of Light: Greatly increases attack range and power for a short time.
Divine bolts pierce through more Bloons
Shoots 3 Divine Bolts at a time.
Blood Sacrifice: Sacrifice a targeted Tower to grant Adora large amounts of XP.
Shoots 4 Divine Bolts at a time.
Ball of Light: Brings forth a powerful ball of energy to strike down the Bloons.
Shoots 5 Divine Bolts at a time.
Divine Bolts pierce through even more Bloons.
Shoots 6 Divine Bolts at a time.
Divine Bolts burn through an extra Bloon layer.
Long Arm of Light becomes even more deadly.
Adora increases attack speed even more.
Shoots 8 Divine Bolts at a time.
Ball of Light is greatly improved.
Biohack: 4 closest Monkeys pop an extra layer per attack for 6 seconds. Affected Monkeys can't attack for 2 seconds after effect ends.
Skimming - earns +$1 for every new bloon spawned.
Bank Hack - all banks earn +5% income.
Cyber Security - Restores 5 lives at the end of each round.
Bloon Trojan - Every few seconds sends a Trojan software virus to random bloon. Affected bloon spawns no children when destroyed.
Syphon Funding: Downgrades most newly spawned bloons by 1 rank. Cash per pop from affected bloons is double. Lasts 10 seconds.
Biohack increases bonus damage and affects 6 Monkeys for 8 seconds.
Cyber Security adds 10 lives per round and can go up to 100 over starting lives.
Bloon Trojan is sent more often.
Bloon Trojan can affect BFB and DDT bloons.
Biohack lasts 9 seconds and affected Monkeys pop 3 extra layers instead of 2.
Syphon Funding lasts 20 seconds and cash per pop is triple normal for affected bloons.
Piercing bombs shot from the tank can explode up to 3 times.
Armor Piercing Shells: Shots can pop Black Bloons and do extra damage to Ceramic Bloons. Duration increases as Churchill levels.
Adds a fast firing machine gun attack to the tank.
Binoculars allow Churchill to pop Camo bloons.
Shells deal more damage and can explode 4 times instead of 3.
MOAB Barrage: Launches a barrage of shells at up to 10 MOAB class bloons on screen, dealing massive damage each time.
Shells get additional increased damage and can explode 6 times.
Armor Piercing Shells pop an extra layer of Bloon and do extra damage to Ceramic and higher.
Machine Gun and Main Gun can pop 1 additional layer per shot.
All attacks do extra damage vs Fortified bloons.
Armor Piercing Shells do even more damage.
All shells pop an extra layer of bloon.
MOAB Barrage shells and main gun do massively increased damage per hit.
Ezili curses bloons with dark voodoo power.
Heartstopper: slows Bloons and prevents any regrow from happening for 6 seconds.
Ezili's main attack now curses multiple bloons.
Damage over time lasts longer and damages faster.
Sacrificial Totem: A totem that gives Camo detection, extra pierce, attack range, attack speed, and projectile speed to nearby Monkeys. Drains 10 lives.
Ezili's attack does far more damage to MOAB class Bloons.
Ezili's attack strips off Camo, Regrow and Fortified properties from non-MOAB class bloons.
MOAB Hex: places a curse on a MOAB class bloon that will jump to a new target if destroyed.
Heartstopper reduced cooldown and increased duration.
Base attack larger splash radius and increased pierce.
Sacrificial Totem lasts longer and costs only 1 life to use.
Base attack larger splash radius and increased pierce.
Each damage tick from base attack pops 2 layers!
MOAB Hex works faster and can destroy BAD Bloons.
Blasts bloons with fire from her pyro gun.
Slightly increased popping power per shot.
Cocktail of Fire: Hurls a flask of flammable liquid, burning bloons that pass through the fire.
Heat it up - Every few seconds creates a powerful blast wave of fire that pops bloons and adds fire to nearby Monkeys attacks.
Attacks cause a burn effect on target bloon.
Heat it up has increased radius.
Shoots 2 blasts of fire per shot.
Initial hit per blast pops 1 extra layer.
Firestorm: Sets the whole screen alight, burning all Bloons and granting the Heat It Up buff to all Monkeys.
Greatly increased popping power, plus projectiles move faster and last longer.
Cocktail of Fire does extra damage and sets MOAB class Bloons alight.
Firestorm has increased duration. Purple bloons are no longer immune to Gwendolin's attacks
Heat it up empowers affected Monkeys to pop 1 extra layer, and do +2 damage to Lead Bloons.
Shoots 3 blasts of fire per shot.
Blasts bloons with fire from her pyro gun.
Slightly increased popping power per shot.
Chemical Cocktail: Hurls a flask of chemicals that burns intensely for a few seconds, incinerating all that pass through the fire.
Heat it up - Every few seconds creates a powerful blast wave of fire that pops bloons and adds fire to nearby Monkeys attacks.
Attacks cause a burn effect on target bloon.
Heat it up has increased radius.
Shoots 2 blasts of fire per shot.
Initial hit per blast pops 1 extra layer.
Science Storm: Briefly sets the whole screen alight, incinerating all Bloons and granting the Heat It Up buff to all Monkeys.
Greatly increased popping power, plus projectiles move faster and last longer.
Chemical Cocktail does extra damage and sets MOAB class Bloons alight.
Science Storm has increased duration. Purple bloons are no longer immune to Gwendolin's attacks
Heat it up empowers affected Monkeys to pop 1 extra layer, and do +2 damage to Lead Bloons.
Shoots 3 blasts of fire per shot.
Science Storm does hugely increased damage.
Sends wolf spirits to attack the bloons.
Nature's Wrath - all Druids in range get +1 pierce.
Brambles: Creates a spiked bush on the track that can pop 50 bloons.
Every 18 seconds creates a totem that slows all bloons near the totem by 30% Less effective vs MOAB-class Bloons.
Increased popping power and projecties move faster.
Wall of Trees: Summons a wall of trees across the track that destroy all bloons that enter. When full, the trees burst into money.
Nature's Clarity - all Magic Monkeys in range get +5 range and +2 pierce, and Druids get an additional +1 pierce.
Further increased popping power and projectile speed.
Nature's Ward slows bloons by 60%, and has reduced cooldown.
Brambles pop 500 bloons each and can damage all Bloon types.
Improved Wrath - all Druid of Wrath pops start each round at 200.
Wall of Trees can hold a lot more bloons.
Sends shark spirits to attack the bloons.
Wrath of the Sea - all Magic Monkeys in range get +1 pierce.
Living Coral: Creates some spiky coral on the track that can pop bloons. Regrows its spikes over time.
Every 18 seconds creates a totem that knocks back every 4th non-MOAB bloon that comes into range.
Increased popping power and projecties move faster.
Coral starts with more spikes and regrows them faster.
Unleash the Krakens: Summons 2 Krakens that block the track that destroy all bloons that get near. Once they've destroyed enough bloons, they leave behind money.
Ocean's Clarity - all Magic Monkeys in range get +5 range and +1 pierce.
Further increased popping power and projectile speed.
Totems knock back every 2nd bloon, spawn more often, and stun every 4th MOAB class bloon.
Coral starts with more spikes, regrows them faster, and can pop all Bloon types.
Crystal Clarity - All Magic Monkeys in range attack 10% faster.
Krakens can destroy a lot more bloons before leaving.
Pat slams bloons into the ground.
Rallying Roar: All nearby Monkeys can pop +1 layer. Lasts 7 seconds.
Sometimes does a powerful slap that pushes bloons away from the exit.
Bloons struck by Pat are stunned for a short time.
Big Squeeze: Grabs a MOAB, BFB, DDT (if visible), or ZOMG and crushes it to bits over 5 seconds.
Attack stuns bloons for longer and can stun MOAB class bloons very briefly.
Rallying Roar increased radius and duration and increased damage of rallied monkeys.
Slap attack can affect more bloons.
Increased attack range and bonus damage to ceramics.
Big Squeeze can grab several big Bloons at once.
Quincy's arrows bounce to up to 3 different targets.
Base attack bounces to up to 5 targets.
Rapid Shot: Triple attack speed for a short time.
Uses his sharp eye sight to shoot Camo bloons.
Arrows do 3 damage to MOAB class bloons.
Base attack bounces to up to 7 targets.
Storm of Arrows: Covers a large area in a deadly rain of arrows.
Arrows do quad damage to MOAB class bloons.
Rapid Shot becomes x4 attack speed and cooldown is reduced.
Quincy attacks faster and Storm of Arrows has reduced cooldown and 50% more arrows.
Each arrow gets more popping power.
Storm of Arrows increased damage per arrow and even more arrows.
Cyber Quincy's arrows bounce to up to 3 different targets.
Base attack bounces to up to 5 targets.
Cyber Shot: Pierce and range increase for a short time
Uses his sharp eye sight to shoot Camo bloons.
Fires EMP arrows every 3rd shot that explode with plasma damage.
Arrows do 3 damage to MOAB class bloons.
Base attack bounces to up to 7 targets.
Cyber Storm: A concentrated surge of cyber arrows rains down from above.
Arrows do quad damage to MOAB class bloons.
Cyber Shot gains an extra 5 pierce and cooldown is reduced.
Cyber Quincy attacks faster and Cyber Storm has reduced cooldown more damaging arrows.
Each arrow gets more popping power.
Cyber Storm deals significantly more damage per arrow.
Striker Jones shoots a powerful bazooka to explode the bloons.
Concussive Shell: shoots a guided shell to the largest bloon on screen, stunning it.
All Bomb Shooters and Mortar Monkeys on screen shoot 10% faster.
Makes all Black bloons less resistant to explosive damage from all Monkeys.
Blast radius and pops for Jones' normal attacks increases greatly.
Pops 2 layers per shot and Mortar Monkeys blast radius increased by 10%.
Bomb Shooters near the hero get +5% range and +25% pierce.
Increased attack speed and increased Concussive Shell pierce, damage, and stun.
Artillery Command: Resets ability cooldowns on all Bomb Shooters and Mortar Monkeys.
Slightly increased attack range, and extra layer pop.
Concussive Shot affects a larger area and for a longer duration.
Concussive Shot cooldown reduced to 11 seconds.
Increased range and pops 4 layers per shot.
All Bomb Shooters and Mortar Monkeys attack an additional 10% faster.
Increased attack speed and makes all Black Bloons vulnerable to explosive damage.
Artillery Command also gives double damage and pops per shot to all Bomb Shooters and Mortar Monkeys for 5 seconds.
Biker Jones shoots a powerful bazooka to explode the bloons.
Concussive Fire: shoots a guided shell to the largest bloon on screen, stunning it and setting it on fire.
All Bomb Shooters and Mortar Monkeys on screen shoot 10% faster.
Makes all Black bloons less resistant to explosive damage from all Monkeys.
Blast radius and pops for Jones' normal attacks increases greatly.
Pops 2 layers per shot and Mortar Monkeys blast radius increased by 10%.
Bomb Shooters near the hero get +5% range and +25% pierce.
Increased attack speed and increased Concussive Fire pierce, damage, and stun.
Artillery Fire: Bomb Shooters and Mortar Monkeys and deal double damage and set bloons on fire
Slightly increased attack range, and extra layer pop.
Concussive Fire affects a larger area and for a longer duration.
Concussive Fire cooldown reduced to 16 seconds.
Increased range and pops 4 layers per shot.
All Bomb Shooters and Mortar Monkeys attack an additional 10% faster.
Increased attack speed and makes all Black Bloons vulnerable to explosive damage.
Artillery Fire gives triple damage and pops per shot to all Bomb Shooters and Mortar Monkeys for 5 seconds.
Triple attack speed for a short time.
Covers a large area in a deadly rain of arrows.
Shoots a guided shell to the largest Bloon on screen, stunning it.
Resets cooldown on all Bomb Shooters.
Shots can pop Black Bloons and do extra damage to Ceramic or higher for 5 seconds.
Launches a barrage of shells at up to 10 MOAB-Class Bloons on screen, dealing massive damage each time.
Hurls a flask of flammable liquid, burning Bloons that pass through the fire.
Sets the whole screen alight, burning all Bloons.
4 closest Monkeys pop an extra 2 layers per attack for 6 seconds. Affected Monkeys can't attack for 2 seconds after effect ends.
Downgrades all newly spawned Bloons by 1 rank. Cash per pop from affected Bloons is double. Lasts 10 seconds.
All nearby Monkeys can pop +1 layer. Lasts 7 seconds.
Grabs a Bloon no bigger than BFB and crushes it to bits over 5 seconds.
Creates a spiked bush on the track that can pop 20 Bloons.
Summons a wall of trees across the track that destroy all Bloons that enter. When full, the trees burst into money.
Any self respecting mad scientist has one
Going to need a tune up...
Quincy hits the battlefield with a bang!
A respectful nod to your opponent.
Levelling up is worth shouting about!
He is Quincy, evolved from Quincy
Turn up the heat on your opponent
You won't need to strike twice
We came from the Oceans, and we shall return to the Oceans.
The Sun God hath no fury like Biker Bones unchained!
Needs a special kind of thinking
Fire burns just as hot in the far future.
A monkey and a kraken against the world
Not the best captain, but you have heard of him.
It never rains but it pours
He'll be gone when the morning comes
That's not a dart. This is a dart!
Who did you think loaded all those tacks?
I must go. My planet needs me.
We can't allow the bloons to capture monkey technology.
Can't get cooler than ice cold.
Venturing where no monkey has gone before.
Do you want to build a snow monkey?
Face first into the snow... but gracefully!
He'll never get that glue out his fur.
200% more arms than a regular bloon.
Turn bloons into an arts and crafts project.
He's got some cleaning up to do.
He'll never get that out of his fur.
Each bullet is inscribed with the name of a bloon.
It doesn't react well to darts.
Smaller than swordfish but just as sharp.
Harmless bubbles following very harmful darts.
It's how you know they're the boss.
All self respecting sea-farer's have one.
Give those bloons a nasty paper cut.
Flying like the good old days.
Sometimes it needs a bit of a push.
Offers no protection from darts (or anything else).
You wouldn't think the ZOMG could get any more intimidating.
Bloons Powered by the Ray of Doom.
Everyone knows guns are more effective if you make the noises.
Not evil. Not evil at all.
These bloons are even MORE evil!
Why walk when you can fly?
The hero we deserve, not the hero we need.
Darts faster than the speed of sound.
It's all there. You can count it.
Keep the hot sun off your bloons.
These bloons will grind some gears.
Don't want to run out of spikes.
Acknowleding what a good job you're doing.
Time to hit that dusty trail.
Larger potions splash in a larger area.
Throws a potion at nearby Monkeys allowing them to pop Leads and do extra damage to Ceramic and MOAB class bloons until it wears off.
Special brew gives Monkeys extra damage, range and attack speed. Lasts longer.
Extra strong brew has even more powerful effect on the target. Lasts even longer.
Berserker brew becomes PERMANENT on Monkeys who drink it.
Attack potions deal more damage to MOAB-class Bloons and strip Fortified off smaller Bloons. Also strengthens Brews and Stimulants.
Coats MOAB bloons in an explosive substance that causes a large explosion when they are popped.
Transformation Ability: turns Alchemist into powerful attack Monster for 20 seconds.
Transforms five Monkeys nearby into crazy attack monsters for 20 seconds.
If no bloons are nearby Alchemist can drench nearby track with acid.
Converts Lead bloons to GOLD! Special solvents do extra damage to Lead bloons, destroying them in one shot and generating cash.
Converts all bloons partially into gold, giving you cash for each pop from affected bloons.
Secret shrink potion converts all affected bloons to Red bloons.
Grows 2 extra banana bunches per round.
Grows 2 MORE extra banana bunches per round.
Produces 5 large banana crates every round worth $600 each.
You want banana? We have banana!
Bananas last 30 seconds before rotting instead of 15.
Bananas are worth 25% more cash per bunch.
All money generated by this farm is now stored in the bank and earns 15% interest each round.
IMF Loan Ability: Gives you $20,000 but you have to pay it back over time.
For when you're too big to fail...
The collect radius of Bananas is larger. For Monkey Banks, glows when bank is full and ready to collect.
Uncollected Bananas auto-collect for half the amount, and Banks auto-collect when full.
Generates money each round and adds it to your total. No fuss.
Earns heaps of money each round and gives Merchantmen +10% income.
Hub of Monkey trades earns colossal income each round.
Shoots larger bombs, they have a larger blast area and more popping power.
Heavy duty bombs can smash through double the layers of Bloon at once and pop more Bloons.
Huge bombs deal greater damage in a large area and allow Frags to pop more Bloons.
Explosions become so violent Bloons are stunned for a short time when they are hit. Range is increased and frags are even more effective.
Bloon shattering explosions do massive damage and can even stun B.A.D.S.
Exchanges bombs for missles, which fire faster and fly faster.
MOAB Maulers do much more damage to MOAB class Bloons and ceramics.
Assassinate MOAB ability: Special missile does massive damage to MOAB class Bloons. Attack range and MOAB-class damage also increased.
Assassinate ability does 6x damage with a short cooldown.
Explosions throw out sharp fragments that can pop more Bloons including Black Bloons.
Throws out secondary bombs instead of sharp fragments every shot.
Every second shot the cluster bombs send out more cluster bombs for even more destruction.
Deals much more damage and, when lives are lost, the Bomb Storm automatically triggers, which destroys all bloons.
Can pop up to 8 Bloons per throw.
Throws sharper glaives instead of boomerangs.
Glaives will bounce from Bloon to Bloon automatically and aggressively.
Multiple Object Advanced Ricochet greatly enhances the already extraordinary powers of the Glaive Ricochet Monkey.
Glaive Lord surrounds itself in 3 special glaives that shred anything that comes near. Glaive Lord's glaives now rip through MOAB-class Bloons.
Replaces arm with a strong bionic arm that can throw boomerangs extremely fast and do more damage to MOAB class Bloons.
Turbo Charge Ability: Makes this Monkey attack incredibly fast for 10 seconds.
Perma Charge has permanent super fast attack speed. Ability increases the lethality even more.
Can throw boomerangs further than normal.
Boomerangs can pop Frozen and Lead Bloons and do more damage to all.
Throws heavy Kylie boomerangs that follow a straight path instead of curved.
Heavy kylie boomerang hits MOAB class Bloons multiple times per throw and sometimes knocks them back a short way along the path.
Special knockback kylies trigger more often and do lots of extra damage.
Increases damage and pierce by a lot.
Uses 3 blades at a time instead of 1.
Increases upgrade name. Yes I ran out of ideas.
Upgrade name. Help I'm out of ideas. Oh yeah it pops leads.
Uses a Longbow that has increased range and damage. Also pops leads.
Blade Master shoots really fast and devastates all Bloon types with ease.
Increases accuracy of the Dartling Gun.
Laser tipped shots shock Bloons into popping again 1 second after being struck.
Rapidly fires much more powerful laser blasts can pop frozen bloons.
Concentrates a powerful beam of energy to a single point.
Creates a solid line of annihilation. You can erase most Bloons at your leisure.
Allows Dartling Gunner to hit Camo bloons.
Shoots depleted bloontonium missiles that can damage all Bloon types and trigger multiple explosions.
Rocket Storm Ability: Launches a powerful storm of rockets in a wide cone.
MOAB Assured Destroyer. Slower firing mega missiles deal extreme damage to MOAB class Bloons.
Darts move faster, can pop more bloons each shot and can pop frozen bloons.
Shoots blasts of deadly buckshot instead of darts.
4-barreled auto-cannon that can be set to attack automatically.
Upgraded to 6 barrels and massively increased damage. Bloons are excluded from existence.
Hard thorns can pop 2 bloons each and pop Lead and Frozen bloons.
Unleashes regular blasts of forked lightning that arc from bloon to bloon.
Gusts of wind blow bloons off the track away from the exit.
Creates powerful balls of lightning that shoot additional lightning bolts.
Superstorm blasts all bloon types for massive damage and blows them away from the exit
Shoots 8 thorns per shot instead of 5.
Attacks convert Regrow Bloons into normal Bloons.
Calls a vine from the ground to entangle and crush bloons one at a time.
Jungle's Bounty Ability: Generates cash each use.
Grows thorned vines along the path that deal constant damage and generates lives and money when ability is activated.
Increases range by a large amount.
Gains 20% attack speed and 1% for every life lost from the starting value after the upgrade. Maxes at 100% and diminishes if lives are restored.
Gains attack speed during the round as long as the Druid is popping bloons.
Boosts attack speed and pierce for other Druids in the radius. Can stack up to 5 times on any single Druid.
The more bloons there are, the more damage it does!
Creates temporary sentry guns and deploys them nearby.
Increased efficiency produces sentries more often and Foam faster.
Increases sentry gun and Engineer attack speed.
Sentries deploy with different damage types based on your need.
Creates super-powerful but highly unstable sentries.
Shoots further and deploys sentries in a much larger area.
Nail gun and Sentry shots do extra damage to MOAB class and Fortified bloons.
Sprays foam that removes Camo and Regrow and pops Lead bloons.
Overclock Ability: Target another Monkey to supercharge its attack speed for a short time.
Ultra-Overclocked Monkeys gain a small but permanent boost each time they are overclocked.
Massivization allows nails to pop 8 Bloons at once, including frozen. Also increases Foam and Sentry effectiveness.
Pins bloons in place for a short time when struck.
Two guns for twice the fun.
Bloon trap captures bloons until full. Tap to empty full trap for cash.
Bloon trap captures bloons until full. Click to empty full trap for cash.
Huge bloon traps can trap even the largest of bloons in them...
Glue soaks through all layers of Bloon.
Glue bloons pop one layer every few seconds.
Extreme solvents melt two layers every second.
Can glue one additional Bloon per shot and applies liquifying compounds that do 10 pops every second.
Bloons a problem? Here's the solution.
Splatters glue across up to 6 bloons per shot.
Glue Strike Ability: Glues all bloons on screen. Glued bloons take extra damage and lead bloons are weakened.
Glue Storm ability pelts the whole screen over 15 seconds with glue. Glued bloons take extra damage while glued.
Makes glue effect last much longer.
Improved glue formula allows it to stick to MOAB class bloons.
Popped bloons that were glued, leave a blob of glue on the track.
Glue so strong it temporarily immobilizes all affected bloons!
Shoots 4 darts per volley instead of 2.
A new targeting option enables Heli to seek and pursue the Bloons automatically.
Razor rotor blades rip up bloons on contact, including Lead and Frozen bloons.
Adds a large missile array and powerful machine guns.
The Apache Prime leaves most bloons wishing they'd never been inflated.
Powerful jets make Heli move much faster.
Allows Heli Pilot to detect and shoot Camo bloons.
Blows bloons away from the Heli, back toward the entrance.
Abilities: Drops lives and cash crates, or can pick up and redeploy most Monkey types.
Deploys a powerful special Monkey Marine with machine gun.
Darts are propelled much faster through the air.
Faster attack speed for all Heli attacks.
Can collide with and shove MOAB class bloons, reversing or slowing their movement. Shove is amplified by Bigger Jets and IFR upgrades.
Automatically calls in mini Comanches when they're most needed.
Upgraded weapons. Also automatically calls in 3 more Comanches. Permanently.
Bloons move slowly even after thawing out.
Can freeze and pop Lead Bloons.
Razor sharp shards fly out when frozen bloons pop.
Detects Camo Bloons and all Bloons including MOABs hit become brittle, taking extra damage for a short time and losing Camo and Regrow properties permanently.
Bloons take huge damage while frozen including MOAB class bloons.
Attacks faster and freezes for longer.
Freezes through 2 layers of bloon and freezes for even longer.
Greatly increases pierce and gains a super cold aura that slows bloons and freezes water nearby.
Snowstorm Ability: Freezes all bloons on screen, and briefly freezes white, zebra, camo and MOAB class.
Ability freezes all regular Bloons for longer, including White, Zebra and Camo, slows MOAB-class longer, and increases the attack speed of all Ice Monkeys.
Can re-freeze bloons that are already frozen.
Shoots freezing bombs at bloons over longer range.
Frozen bloons grow sharp icicles that can pop bloons that touch them.
Shoots huge icicle spikes that do huge damage to MOAB class bloons and freezes them.
Flies fast and launches anti-MOAB missiles.
Shoots 16 darts per volley, and twice as fast.
The Bloons will wish they had never come.
Drops pineapples to the ground that explode violently after a few seconds. Ace's explosive attacks are improved.
Allows Monkey Ace to hit Camo bloons.
Drops a line of bombs when crossing the bloon track.
Increases effectiveness of bomb drops. Ground Zero Ability: drops a huge bomb that destroys most things on screen.
A very, very large bomb. Someone put a stop to this craziness!
New central flight path for maximum map coverage.
Darts automatically seek out and pop bloons by themselves.
Rapidly fires darts and bombs, dominating most bloon types easily.
All weapons on board shoot faster.
Launches waves of fighter planes that strafe their targets and fire missiles at MOAB class Bloons.
Does extra damage. Can place other Monkeys on the upper decks of the ship and increases attack speed of all water based Monkeys and Monkey Aces.
Adds a spray of 5 sharpened grapes to the ship.
Burning hot grape shot can pop Lead bloons and set bloons on fire.
Adds a powerful cannon that shoots out powerful bombs.
Adds 2 cannons to the ship and cannon attacks do more damage. MOAB Takedown Ability: harpoons a MOAB class bloon and brings it down.
Greatly increased attack speed for all attacks and can shoot 3 grappling hooks at once.
Much longer range and projectiles fly faster.
Allows the ship to hit Camo bloons.
Attacks faster and generates lots of money per round. Monkeys in radius have increased sell value.
Generates more cash per round, increases cash earned by up to 20 other Merchantmen by the number of Merchantmen, and boosts all Merchantmen damage.
Allows long range targeting of bloons in radius of your other towers.
Adds Submerge targeting option that permanently reveals Camo bloons in its radius but does not attack while submerged.
Submerge to detect camo, pop bloons and reduce ability cooldowns of nearby water-based Monkeys by 15%.
Reduces ability cooldowns everywhere by 20%. While in radius, Heroes earn XP 50% faster and water Monkeys' ability cooldowns are halved.
Sub's darts can pop an additional 3 Bloons.
Heat tipped darts and a more powerful reactor allow popping of Frozen and Lead bloons.
Missile seeks target within range and does extra MOAB and Ceramic damage.
First Strike Ability: A devastating missile strike targeting the largest bloon on screen, plus splash damage.
Automatically triggers an extra anti-MOAB missile whenever MOAB-Class Bloon spawns from the Bloon entrance.
Added twin gun doubles attack speed. Enhances Ballistic Missile and Bloontonium Reactor.
Airburst darts split into 3 on impact for massive popping power. Further enhances Ballistic Missile and Bloontonium Reactor.
Adds a third gun for even faster firing.
Special AP darts gain increased damage and popping power, plus additional damage to MOAB class Bloons.
Adds extra pierce and damage to Commander and all Subs in its radius.
Increases influence radius of the village.
Increases attack speed of all Monkeys in the radius.
All Primary Monkeys in radius get more range, pierce and projectile speed.
All Primary Monkeys in radius get tier 1 upgrades for free, increased range and reduced ability cooldowns.
Adds Mega Ballista attack, plus all Primary Monkeys in radius get more popping power and tier 1 and 2 upgrades for free.
Prevents regrow bloons from working while in the radius of the Village.
Allows all Monkeys in the radius to attack Camo bloons.
The Bureau grants special bloon popping knowledge, allowing nearby Monkeys to pop all bloon types.
Call to Arms Ability: Gives nearby Monkeys +50% attack speed and pops for a short time.
Ability now increases attack speed and pops by 100% for all Monkeys for 20 seconds
Provides 10% discount to all Monkeys and upgrades tier 3 or less purchased in the radius of the Village.
An additional 5% discount that can stack with up to 2 other Villages with this upgrade.
All bloon sends give 10% more eco
Increases influence, bloon sends are worth another 10% more eco, and collects bananas dropped in range.
Absorbs all nearby Banana Farms and their income, freeing up space for new Monkeys.
Bigger shells deliver a bigger blast radius.
Smash through 2 layers of bloons at once!
Blast shockwave stuns bloons at impact, pops bloons in a wider area, and increases Burny Stuff damage.
Devastating explosions pop 5 layers of bloon, plus increases Burny Stuff damage further.
Blasts deeply through Bloons and layers over a huge area, plus powerful Burny Stuff damage.
Increases the attack speed of the Mortar.
Heavy shells do extra damage to Ceramic, Lead, all Fortified, and all stunned bloons. Can also pop Black bloons.
Significantly faster reload and unlocks Bombardment Ability: 8 seconds of relentless destruction.
Pop and Awe Ability: rains explosions over the whole screen, damaging and stunning all bloons. Main attack gains bonus damage to stunned Bloons.
Damaged Bloons are set ablaze momentarily with each hit.
Camo bloons popped by flares lose their camoflage permanently.
Shattering shells strip all special bloon properties off all but the biggest bloons.
Superhot burny stuff melts through 5 layers of bloon each shot, burns MOAB class bloons for extra damage, and strips DDT camo.
Increases attack range and attack speed.
Throws incredibly fast, 8 shurikens per shot!
Some bloons will become distracted and move backwards.
Ninja attacks can strip camo from bloons they hit.
Increases attack speed and pierce of nearby Ninjas. Stacks 10 times.
Sabotage Ability: Lasts 15 seconds. During the sabotage, all bloons move at reduced speed.
Ability duration is longer, and MOAB bloon health is reduced during the sabotage.
Shurikens with seek out and pop bloons automatically.
Throws out spiked caltrops onto the track nearby.
Throws a flash bomb that stuns multiple bloons.
Throws powerful timed charges at MOAB bloons.
Shots pop through 4 layers of bloon, and both bullets and shrapnel can pop Lead and Frozen Bloons.
Shots can pop through 7 layers of bloon.
20 damage per shot, plus bonus damage to ceramics.
Immobilzes MOAB class bloons for a short time.
Crippled MOABs are immobilized for longer and take extra damage from all other attacks.
Allows Sniper to detect and do an additional 2 damage to Camo bloons.
Damaged bloons spray out a cone of sharp shrapnel.
Shots bounce to new targets up to 3 times.
Supply Drop Ability: drops a crate full of cash. Regular attack also damages Lead Bloons and increases Shrapnel popping power.
Supply drop gives much more cash. Grants Elite targeting prio and faster reload to all snipers.
Fully automatic weapon with incredible popping power.
A lost life gives this Sniper 4x attack speed for a short time in retaliation. Also attacks faster the further the Bloons are along the track.
Creates larger piles of spikes per shot.
Cuts through Lead bloons and frozen bloons.
Produces spiked balls that do extra damage to Ceramic and Fortified bloons.
Spiked mines explode violently when they lose all their spikes.
Creates gigantic exploding spiked mines that can wipe out almost anything.
Spike Storm Ability: Shoots out a thick layer of spikes over the entire track.
Regularly sets a carpet of spikes over the whole track.
Increases range for spike pile drops, plus piles last longer.
Spike Factory gains special targeting priority.
Extra deadly spikes can pop through 2 layers per spike and last even longer.
High damage spikes become almost permanent.
Shoots powerful blasts of laser instead of darts
Super fast plasma melts through lead bloons.
Channels power from the core of the Sun.
Tower sacrifices enhance and modify the Temple's attacks.
Tremble before the AWESOME power of the TRUE Sun God!!
Why settle for super when you can have EPIC?
Half Super Monkey, half killer robot of death. Shoots from 2 guns at once!
Annihilation Ability: Destroys most bloons completely and utterly within blast radius.
Bloons get pushed backwards or slowed after each hit.
Enables Super Monkey to shoot slightly further and to see Camo bloons.
Dark blades increase knockback and pierce and deal extra damage to MOAB class bloons. Gains Darkshift ability to shift to a nearby location.
Champion's dark blades excel at puncturing and ruining all bloon types. Darkshift ability extends mapwide.
We turn to him, when all hope is lost...
Shoots superhot tacks that do extra damage and can pop Lead Bloons.
Damages many more bloons with a deadly ring of flame instead of tacks.
Deadly inferno of flame roasts bloons into oblivion.
Tacks fly out further than normal.
Even longer range tacks that can pop more Bloons.
Switches tacks out for sharp blades that can pop up to 5 additional Bloons.
Activated Ability: Covers the area in a storm of blades.
Even more powerful Maelstrom ability and lasts longer.
Shoots 10 tacks instead of 8, plus increases Ring of Fire damage.
Shoots out 12 tacks per shot and increases Ring of Fire damage further.
Magic shots seek out the bloons, even behind cover.
Bigger, more powerful magic blasts pop through 2 layers of bloon.
Faster attacks with increased range, damage, and popping power.
Faster firing magic does huge damage to most Bloon types.
A true master of magical wizardry.
Every few seconds casts an explosive fireball spell.
Creates a super hot wall of fire across the track to roast the bloons as they pass.
Spews endless flames at nearby bloons and enhances Fireball and Wall of Fire.
Summon Phoenix Ability: Powerful phoenix wreaks bloon havoc for 20 seconds.
Wizard Lord becomes a master of the flame, turning into a super powerful Lava Phoenix for a short time.
More powerful magic shots move faster and can pop more bloons.
Allows the Wizard to hit Camo bloons.
Gains a dark magic attack that periodically reveals the location of all nearby Camo Bloons permanently.
Reanimate recently popped enemies as servants to destroy the bloons.
Reanimates more powerful Bloon servants to obliterate the enemy, plus enhances the undead Bloons of all other Necromancers.
Converts up to 10 nearby Dart Monkeys into Super Monkeys for 10 seconds.
Elite membership of this club grants the Dart Monkeys even more power!
Makes this Monkey attack incredibly fast for 10 seconds.
Makes this Monkey deal additional damage for 15 seconds.
Special missile flies out and does massive damage to MOAB-Class Bloons.
Assassinate ability does 6x damage with a short cooldown.
Covers the area in a storm of blades.
Even more powerful Maelstrom ability and lasts longer.
Freezes all Bloons on screen for a short time.
Ability is so cold it freezes all Bloon types including cold immune and MOAB-Class.
Glue Storm ability pelts the whole screen over 10 seconds with glue.
Drops a crate full of cash.
Supply drop gives much more cash.
A lost life gives this Sniper 2x attack speed for a short time in retaliation.
A devastating missile strike on the largest Bloon on screen. Destroys up to a ZOMG Bloon in one go, or many smaller Bloons.
Automatically triggers MOAB Assassin effect whenever MOAB-Class Bloon spawns from the Bloon entrance.
Grapples a MOAB-Class Bloon and brings it down.
Can shoot 3 grappling hooks at once, and plunder extra cash from each MOAB-Class Bloon brought down with them.
Drops a huge bomb that destroys most things on screen.
A very, very large bomb. Someone put a stop to this craziness!
Can pick up and redeploy most Monkey types.
Deploys a powerful special Monkey Marine with machine gun.
Rains explosions over the whole screen, popping and immobilizing all Bloons for a few seconds.
Sends a powerful storm of rockets in all directions.
Each missile does extreme damage to MOAB-Class Bloons.
Powerful phoenix wreaks Bloon havoc for 20 seconds.
Wizard Lord becomes a master of the flame, turning into a super powerful Lava Phoenix for a short time.
Reanimate even more powerful Bloon servants to obliterate the enemy.
Destroys most Bloons completely and utterly within blast radius.
We turn to him, when all hope is lost...
Lasts 15 seconds. During the sabotage, all Bloons move at reduced speed.
Ability duration is longer, and MOAB-Class Bloons spawn with less health during the sabotage.
Farms nearby the Druid earn 50% more money for a short time.
Gives you $10,000 but you have to pay it back over time.
For when you're too big to fail...
Target Monkey becomes super powered for 60 seconds.
Shoots out a thick layer of spikes over the entire track.
Sets a carpet of spikes over the whole track, every round.
Creates a powerful Monkey whose abilities are based on Magic Monkeys nearby.
Call to Arms Ability: Gives nearby Monkeys +50% attack speed and pops for 12 seconds.
Ability affects ALL Monkeys and lasts for 15 seconds.
The Temple demands sacrifice. All nearby towers will be destroyed, enhancing the Temple's incredible power in different ways. You have been warned...
Are you sure you want to upgrade this tower?
Are you sure you wish to forfeit the game? \n You will receive a loss and your opponent will be awarded a victory if you choose to surrender.
If ya know what I mean

You have been promoted to Yellow Stadium!
Camo Bloons can only be seen by Monkeys with that capability.
Regrow Bloons will grow back lost layers every few seconds.
Fortified Bloons are tough and require more hits to pop.
These mods can help you win more easily, but beware, they will be more expensive to send and of course, your opponent has access to them too!

Bloons TD Battles 2 is supported by advertising

We ask that you allow us to track a small amount of data in order to show you more relevant ads. This does not change the number of ads you are shown, but will result in ads that are more interesting to you.\n\nThis data will be stored securely and will not be used for any other purpose.
Hold up! Uploading your save is taking a little longer than usual.\nWe'll be back and ready to battle in no time!
First win of the day earns you a chest
You receive cash equal to your eco every 6 seconds. You can increase your eco by sending Bloons.
Different bloon sends will increase your eco by different amounts. Some more powerful bloon sends will even reduce your eco!
Camo Bloons are very sneaky. Most monkeys won't be able to see them without upgrades.
Watch out for Regrow Bloons! These heart shaped Bloons will grow back layers if not popped quickly.
Many attacks will bounce right off the hard shell of Lead Bloons. Try using special attacks like explosives or fire.
MOABs are big, slow and extremely tough. If even one of them gets through it's an instant defeat!
Ceramic Bloons have tough outer layers. You'll need to chip away at them to reach the weaker Bloons inside.
White and zebra Bloons can't be frozen or damaged by ice attacks.
Black and zebra Bloons can't be damaged by explosives.
Purple Bloons can't be hurt by energy attacks such as fire, lasers or magic.
Bloons with metal bands round them have been fortified. They'll take twice as much damage to pop.
DDTs are large, black MOAB Bloons that have the same properties as camo, lead and black Bloons.
The Dart Monkey is an efficient, cheap attacker for the early game with some powerful upgrades for later rounds.
The Bomb Shooter fires explosives that can pop lead Bloons. The MOAB Mauler upgrades are especially effective against MOAB Bloons.
Ice Monkeys can freeze Bloons solid to stop them in their tracks. Not all monkeys can pop frozen Bloons though.
Tack Shooters are effective when placed on tight corners. Their Blade Maelstrom upgrade is great for when you're being overrun by a lot of Bloons.
The Glue Gunner can't pop Bloons without upgrades, only slow them down. You'll need the Corrosive Glue upgrade or another tower to pop the glued Bloons.
The Sniper Monkey has unlimited range that covers the entire map. It won't be able to see through solid objects though.
Monkey Subs can be upgraded to use other monkeys ranges as well as their own.
The Monkey Buccaneer and the Monkey Sub are the only monkeys that can be placed on water.
The Monkey Ace has several flight paths it can follow. Choose the one that best matches the map.
The Heli Pilot can be manually controlled, ordered to remain stationary, or patrol between two points. Upgrade to Pursuit to have it chase Bloons automatically.
The Mortar Monkey drops bombs directly onto the track from above and can target anywhere on the map. It can be upgraded to add fire damage or camo revealing flares.
A Wizard Monkey with the Monkey Sense and Fireball upgrades can pop the ever elusive camo-lead Bloons.
Super Monkey is one of the most expensive monkeys in the game. It can be upgraded into the all powerful Sun God.
The Ninja is the one of the only monkeys that can see camo bloons without upgrades.
The Alchemist can buff your other monkeys and attack the Bloons.
The Banana Farm creates bananas over time that you can collect for cash. It's a good alternative to using bloon sends to increase eco.
The Spike Factory is a good last line of defence against leaking Bloons.
The Engineer creates sentry turrets that are each as powerful as a base level Dart Monkey. Great for dealing with lots of weaker Bloons.
Once you have every upgrade unlocked for a monkey you can unlock their mastery cosmetics.
You can spend Hero Points on exclusive cosmetic items in the Hero Reward screen.
The weekly Hero Showcase contains exclusive hero cosmetics you can buy with Hero Points and Monkey Money.
You can customize your emotes, bloon skins, avatar, and other effects in the Bling screen.
Hero rewards are unlocked in order using Hero Points and Monkey Money. Get them all to unlock an alternate version of that hero.
You get a new Battle Chest for every third win.
There are three different types of Battle Chests. Standard, Great, and Mighty.
You can only store three chests at once. Becoming a VIP unlocks a fourth slot.
Battle Chests can contain many exciting rewards including Monkey Money, Tower XP, Hero Points and Multiplier Boosts.
Earn trophies by defeating your opponents to move up the arenas. Reach the Hall of Masters to compete with the best of the best.
Trophies are reset at the end of each monthly season. The number you have at the end of the season decides your starting amount for the next season.
Quincy is a good all round hero who excels in the early rounds of the game.
Gwendolin is a short range hero who attacks with fire. She's good at dealing with crowds of Bloons and can pop leads.
Striker Jones is all about explosives. He can buff Bomb Shooters and Mortar Monkeys.
Obyn Greenfoot attacks with high-pierce magical wolves. He can also buff nearby Druids and other Magic Monkeys.
It is recommended that you master the basics of Battles 2 by completing all 4 lessons.\n\nAre you sure you wish to quit?
Welcome to Bloons TD Battles 2! Just follow my lead and I'll show you how to become a Battles expert.
There are 4 lessons to complete. Get through them all and a new hero, Gwendolin, will join the team.
A training dummy? Seriously? Drop me in, I'll get through this with one eye closed.
Heroes like Quincy are unique and powerful. Drag Quincy onto the battlefield.
Oh yeah that's the good stuff!
Heroes earn XP in game and level up automatically during play.
At level 3, Heroes gain a special Activated Ability.
Let's bring in some Dart Monkeys to hold off these Bloons.
If Bloons escape you lose lives. Send Bloons at your opponent to win.
Remember, Heroes level up in game but Monkeys gain XP after Battles have finished.
Let's spend some of that sweet Dart Monkey XP and get some new upgrades.
In the next battle we'll be able to upgrade Dart Monkeys to Long Range Darts.
Hey look, we can also afford Enhanced Eyesight. Let's buy it now.
We're all set, time for another Battle!
Looks like we're heading back to the Glade. Ready Up!
Time to add more Monkey Towers to our loadout.
Awesome! With a full loadout, we're ready to battle!
Bloons come in all shapes and sizes.
We'll need a well rounded team to ensure we can handle anything that comes our way.
Place one of each Monkey Tower.
Remember those Dart Monkey upgrades? Time to put them to work!
Purchase 2 upgrades for the Dart Monkey.
Sweet! Upgrading Monkey Towers makes them more powerful.
Purchase 2 upgrades for the Tack Shooter and Bomb Shooter.
Our defenses are solid. Let's end this!
Send Bloons at your opponent to win.
Woah! It seems like something slipped past my bow. Let's try that again.
Remember to place and upgrade Monkey Towers to stop the Bloons getting through.
Alright, you're really getting the hang of this. Let's keep going!
Let's go! You know what to do.
It's important to build defenses to hold off bloons but its also important to build income.
Income is generated every few seconds and added to your cash.
We can increase our income by sending Bloons. The income amount is shown by the green number on the Bloon send.
Try increasing your income to 300 whilst holding off the Bloons.
Woah! It seems like something slipped past my bow. Let's try that again.
Income building is important but remember to balance sending Bloons with building defenses.
Oh come on T.D are you even trying?
We've reached our target income. Let's finish this!
Send more powerful Bloons at your opponent to win.
Had enough beating up Training Dummies?
Ok here we go, no more Training Dummies.
Gwen won't be so easy to defeat, we'll need to use all of the skills we've learned so far.
Remember winning battles requires a good balance between building strong defenses and sending bloons at you opponent.
Gwen's defenses are really strong but she has a weakness. Her fire damage can't pop Purple Bloons!
Nooooo you got me! Well played.
